affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "性质, 状态, 机构"

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 有偏见的，有倾向的；宣传性的
宣传性的；有支持某种立场的倾向

word_mean_info__list.difference: 指事物发展总的方向、倾向或趋势。
指固有或习得的倾向性，强调没有外来的影响或干扰。
指向某一方面发展或在确趋向中行动。

word_group.brief_definition: 看到的趋势；看见趋势；看到趋势

bilingual.source: By observing the histogram, we can find the central tendency of the data.
bilingual.target: 通过观察直方图，我们可以发现数据的集中趋势。

bilingual.source: Calculating the median can help us understand the central tendency of the data.
bilingual.target: 计算中位数可以帮助我们理解数据的中心趋势。

bilingual.source: The median provides a better measure of central tendency when there are outliers.
bilingual.target: 当存在异常值时，中位数提供了更好的集中趋势测量。

bilingual.source: Involuntary part-time employment in the US shows general tendency of decline.
bilingual.target: 美国的非自愿兼职工作整体呈下降趋势。

bilingual.source: This tendency in the natural sciences has long been evident in the social sciences too.
bilingual.target: 自然科学中的这种趋势在社会科学中也很明显。

bilingual.source: So, that completes central tendency and dispersion.
bilingual.target: 这样我们就介绍完了集中趋势和离散趋势
出现了通货紧缩的趋势。
这个下跌的趋势是可预知的。

bilingual.source: And this tendency isn't going to stop.
The tendency of language the drift of language

list.abstract: tendency，英文单词，名词，作名词时意为“倾向，趋势；癖好”。

yingyinNormal.en: No kidding. You speak English really well. So do you, except for your tendency to end sentences with prepositions.
yingyinNormal.zh: 真的啊，你英文说得很好啊。你也是，就是你好像老喜欢把介词放在句尾。

yingyinNormal.en: The dark ages were actually fun times. Their new master had a tendency to party all night and sleep all day. Ahem. Yoo-hoo.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欧洲中世纪其实挺好玩的，他们的新主人有白天睡觉，晚上狂欢的癖好。咳咳，哟呼。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 温柔的；亲切的；温情的；慈爱的；嫩的；柔软的；脆弱的；敏感的；年轻的；微妙的
n. 趋势；趋向；倾向；政治社团

word_family.mean: v. 有某种倾向；往往会；照顾；照料；照管；护理；趋向；趋于；管理；易于

examination_example.sentence: The findings do not simply explain people's <highlight>tendency</highlight> to befriend those of similar ethnic backgrounds, say the researchers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究人员说，这一发现并不能简单地解释人们与具有相似种族背景的人交朋友的倾向。

examination_example.sentence: Today we have a <highlight>tendency</highlight> to label obesity as a disgrace.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，我们有一种倾向，认为肥胖是一种耻辱。

examination_example.sentence: This <highlight>tendency</highlight> in the natural sciences has long been evident in the social sciences too.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 自然科学中的这种趋势在社会科学中也很明显。

affix_sense_info.affix_sense_chinese: 名词后缀, "性质, 状态, 机构"

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 温柔的；亲切的；温情的；慈爱的；嫩的；柔软的；脆弱的；敏感的；年轻的；微妙的
n. 趋势；趋向；倾向；政治社团

word_family.mean: v. 有某种倾向；往往会；照顾；照料；照管；护理；趋向；趋于；管理；易于

sense_info_list.en: an inclination towards a particular characteristic or type of behavior

examination_example.sentence: Essentially, we have this <highlight>tendency</highlight> to keep stretching out the decision-making process.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 本质上，我们倾向于延长决策过程。

examination_example.sentence: Some suggest that women's immune systems benefit from their <highlight>tendency</highlight> to prioritize and nurture social connections.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一些人认为，女性的免疫系统得益于她们优先考虑和培养社会联系的倾向。

examination_example.sentence: A teacher could not seriously tell a parent their child has a low genetic <highlight>tendency</highlight> to study when external factors clearly exist.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当外部因素明显存在时，教师不能严肃地告诉家长，他们的孩子学习的遗传倾向较低。

examination_example.sentence: When people experience decision fatigue-when they are tired of making choices-they have a <highlight>tendency</highlight> to choose to go with status quo (现状).
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当人们感到决策疲劳时，厌倦做出选择时，他们倾向于选择符合现状的状态。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>

sense_info_list.en: an inclination towards a particular characteristic or type of behavior

examination_example.sentence: In 1986, psychologists introduced the Boredom Proneness Scale, designed to measure an individual's overall <highlight>tendency</highlight> to feel bored.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1986 年，心理学家推出了无聊倾向量表，旨在衡量个人感到无聊的总体倾向。

examination_example.sentence: I have developed a <highlight>tendency</highlight> to buy more small or non-essential items.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我倾向于购买更多的小物品或非必需品。
